CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 12, 1956, pg. A30, reads: "Umbrella Scene...in the Beauticians fashion show, held at the Fort Pitt Hotel during the two-day Trade Show, presents Beverly Johnson, Rosemarie White and Grace Cherry. The show was directed by Lillian Allen. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Beverly Johnson, Rosemarie White, and Grace Cherry holding umbrellas, posed at bottom of stairs in Fort Pitt Hotel during Pennsylvania Beauticians Trade Show
